                               java.awt.Dimension targetDims)

      • uniformizePixelValues

        public static void uniformizePixelValues(java.util.List<java.lang.String> imageFilenames,
                         java.lang.String suffix)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Uniformizes the pixels values of the given list of images. Images are exported as FILENAME_SUFFIX (FILENAME is stripped from its extension and the '_' should be included in SUFFIX as well as the extension).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • uniformizeCanvasDimensions

                              java.lang.String suffix)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Uniformizes the canvas dimensions of the given list of images. Images are exported as FILENAME_SUFFIX (FILENAME is stripped from its extension and the '_' should be included in SUFFIX as well as the extension).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getNewDimensionsWithAspectRatioConserved

        public static java.awt.Dimension getNewDimensionsWithAspectRatioConserved(java.awt.Dimension original,
                                                          java.awt.Dimension target)
                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the new image dimensions from the original and target dimensions. The new dimensions conserve the ratio of the original dimensions.
